website_summaries.verdict: Offers a 180% elasticity rating, allowing for greater range of motion for athletes with joint pain.
pros: You'll have full range of motion because of the high level of elasticity, while receiving support for muscle and joint pain
Strong adhesive stays in place well
Works for both sports and non-sports injuries
cons: Tape tends to peel at edges and fray after a couple days

customer_reviews.title: Stays in place!/effective
customer_reviews.text: I used to use KT Tape. I found that it would start peeling off of my skin on the first day after I applied it. I like rock tape because it's sticks very very well. It is effective for helping with pain. Great for runners/athletes. If you round the ends by cutting them, it really helps with the tape not pulling off so quickly. I used to use KT tape but it came off easily and want effective for pain. I use this stuff in shin splints, shoulder pain, etc. I am about to run/workout with no pain.
customer_reviews.author: julie russell

customer_reviews.title: Bring some oil to remove -Buy Bulk
customer_reviews.text: On a clean skin surface. This tape definitely sticks easily for a week, no worries about showers, baths, kayaking. Bring some oil to remove/ help dissolve the adhesive. Our family is allergic to adhesives so put some Milk of Magnesium down first! I use this for power walk races. To support my arm that does not have a shoulder. Muscle strains etc.. I love Kinesiology tape. For cost effectiveness. buy bulk
customer_reviews.author: GardenMaiden

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick.  Buy solid colors instea!
customer_reviews.text: This product does NOT adhere like solid colored RockTape. It seems to be a bit thicker, which I attributed to the coloring of the tape. I have the orange and black and they both stay on for up to two weeks. The camo usually peels off within a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Hit and Miss
customer_reviews.text: The first order was great. The second roll I purchased lost adhesion after 1 shower. The first roll I bought was better than the name brand stuff. Some consistency would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Burt VanBuren

customer_reviews.title: Not very sticky
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for something long lasting, this isn’t it. I used on my ankle and part of it started to peel off. After I showered, most peeled off. Another day, I tried putting it on and had some trace lotion on (I know, you’re supposed to clean everything off skin for max adhesion), and it just wouldn’t stick. I haven’t had these issues with KT tape pro, which is similar in cost
customer_reviews.author: Elaine C

customer_reviews.title: tape works ok - didn't receive the exact order though
customer_reviews.text: This is my second roll of Rocktape. I ordered the pre cut strips this time and it is NOT precut. Same roll that requires cutting with scissors like last time. I have arthritis in my hands and preferred not having to cut the edges to round them etc. Also my first roll was black with stars and it seems to have less play or stretch than this pink tape. Color shouldn't make a difference but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Ann Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Use to use kt tape pro but they must have changed the adhesive because it doesn’t stay on after shower. Decided to try rock tape and I’m super happy, for a little more money it’s totally worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ducharme

customer_reviews.title: I've tried the others and this is the absolute BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this on the recommendation of my trainer and it did not disappoint what so ever! It has amazing stick and definitely helps with the healing process. So that I wasn't one of those consumers that swears by something without having tried other brands, I have forced myself to try other brands, most recently the KT Tape Pro and I have to say, I will keep recommending Rock Tape because there's nothing "Pro" about the KT Tape.
customer_reviews.author: MandaB9780

customer_reviews.title: OK, but not as good as KT Pro
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, economical alternative to KT tape; however, the KT tape pro is MUCH better than RockTape. The RockTape served its purpose, but it was prone to rolling up off my foot. Also, many people noted that the normal RockTape can withstand water and swimming. Did okay in the shower, but this could not hold up to a few kicks in the pool. So this is satisfactory, but if you are taping an area that gets a lot of contact/movement (i.e., feet, ankle), I'd recommend an option with a stronger adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: NikB

customer_reviews.title: Rock Tape helps with my osteoarthritis
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoarthritis in both knees. I have had no issues with the Rock Tape staying in place and my knees feel more stable when they are taped up and I have less pain. Right now, I only use it when I know I have to walk a long distance or when I bowl leagues or tournaments. I would use it more often I could buy it in bulk at a lower cost. I could easily go through 3 rolls a month or more, but right now I am limiting my use of it to 1 roll per month.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur W Word Jr

customer_reviews.title: Rock tape is far superior than any other athletic tape on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I have had to tape my ankles for the past 1+ year after a bad fall that I broke and tore ligaments and tendons. I’ve tried others but Rock Tape lasts for up to 6 days, is water/swear proof and you can completely feel it holding the strained ligaments and tendons together. Other brands I’ve tried only last 1 to 2 days and isn’t as water proof as they claim. Rock may be a bit more expensive but when you consider that you use 3 times as much it more than pays for itself!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stine

customer_reviews.title: Great Tape for my Ailments
customer_reviews.text: I injured my left wrist in a car accident and pain still radiates in it from time to time. I probably have a problem with the muscle, ligament, nerve, who knows, but when I go bowling, I use this rock tape and it actually doesn't hurt through all my practicing and my league play. You can cut it to any size you want and use it for support on your fingers too. I always have a roll on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Judarry

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, adhesive stays for at least 24 hrs. It did add support to my knee, but I didn't see where it provided a whole lot of pain relief. The literature inside the box gives a YouTube channel on how to use the tape, but of course, I never took the time to watch it, so maybe my results would have been better.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Strong. Precut is a nice feature. Adhesive lessens in the last 1/4 of the roll
customer_reviews.text: Works well but the last 1/4 of the roll isn't as adhesive as the first 3/4 roll so it starts falling off after only a few days instead of the 5-7 days. It's heavier than some other tapes so offers more support. I like the precut roll. The adhesive is harsh so if you have sensitive skin be aware. Definitely exfoliate if using it on feet.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Sport tape
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t stay for too long and the area that does it pulls your skin too much when taking out
customer_reviews.author: Roxana D

customer_reviews.title: Actually holds on
customer_reviews.text: I've tried nearly every brand of Kinesio tape. I tape my ankle after a riding accident. The pain is on the top of my foot where my ankle meets my foot. This area bends a lot and every other tape starts to peel off after an hour. I need the tension to keep across the top, but not around the bottom of my foot. This actually stays stuck and tense for the whole day. Doesn't stick for 5 days or some such nonsense, but stays put for the day.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Great tape but "precut" may be continuous strip
customer_reviews.text: I love rock tape the best out of all the various KT tape brands. It sticks better to my skin and doesn't cause irritation. Definitely does what it is supposed to do. And I love all the fun colors and brands. However, I ordered the precut version and received the uncut product. The label on the box even says precut but the product box itself says uncut.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stays Put Better than the Other Brands
customer_reviews.text: I have used other brands of kineology tape, but Rock Tape is far superior. I'm using it on my knee right now, and I've had to apply it three times in 3 weeks. In that time, I have been swimming a lot, and showering a lot (because chlorine). The other brands would stay on for a few days, but the pool usually did them in. Not Rock Tape. It's still stuck fast.
customer_reviews.author: eetempleton

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this tape for each of my total knee surgeries. I was up walking without pain the next day. It reduces the friction when the body part is swollen. I now use it for back pain. I’m virtually held together with Rocktape. It holds up so much better than other brands,especially with water aerobics. Thanks to Capo!
customer_reviews.author: pk schramm

customer_reviews.title: Great for sore muscles
customer_reviews.text: If you have a sore back and need relief this tape help with over stretching. The tape stretch to desire length and the adhesion last for a few days even after showers. Great back support, I recommend it for sore muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great support, long lasting tape.
customer_reviews.text: Great tape, stayed on for 2-3 days. I probably could have gotten 4 days use if I didn't take a bath (instead of a shower) every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have experienced knee pain after surgery for nine months until I started using this tape. It has all but alleviated the pain and has allowed me to up my running mileage back to my pre-surgery distance.
customer_reviews.author: Drsportlaw

customer_reviews.title: first time to use
customer_reviews.text: This is my Doctor recommendation after my left hand got hurt,i was using the wrist production but wont work so good,my doctor put this tape(Rocktape)onme and i found the pain from the tendon and nerve is gone.
customer_reviews.author: peter chang

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick. May not be real product.
customer_reviews.text: We have used rock tape for a while now, and always bought it at the hospital when we have pt. My daughter wanted fun colors this time, so I ordered 3 different colors. They do not stick. Peeled off after 25 mins. Usually this stuff will stay on my daughters arm for 3-5 DAYS. very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Lang

customer_reviews.title: Great adhesive!
customer_reviews.text: I first bought KT tape and was not impressed. Bought this tape as a replacement and the difference is night and day! Sticks great, doesn't roll up with clothing or sleeping and provides great support. I even wore in the shower with no problems. Would definitely recommend this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie H.

customer_reviews.title: Tape Did not adhere well
customer_reviews.text: I was first introduced to this tape while in physical therapy. It was placed on my knee to reduce swelling and I felt it really helped. I was disappointed because the tape did not adhere well. I a made sure my skin was clean and dry before applying the Rockdale. I used 1/3 of the roll and every time the tape loosened at the end so it was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Eyetailyen

customer_reviews.title: Is what is advertised
customer_reviews.text: I needed this for a pulled muscle on my foot. The adhesion was awesome. Once applied it stayed in place for several days, and I shower daily. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: flomzilla

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Tape To Have
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality tape. Breathable. It stays on just as well as other tape I have used. This tape seems to have a thickness to it and it really stretches out the skin. It might become my favorite because of this reason. Edits: This tape is going to be my go-to tape. Not only has it relieved my muscle pain better, it actually stays on after a shower. This is something I cannot say about the 2 other brands of tape that I have tested. This is high quality tape and I highly recommend it over any other brand out there. Good luck.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Hopes
customer_reviews.text: My son is a competition swimmer at a high school, since he has problems with his shoulder I thought this tape would be perfect after reading reviews. Unfortunately before he was even done with the warm up the tape was not sticking. Fortunately we still had a roll of the KT Extreme.
customer_reviews.author: Ride2Show

customer_reviews.title: This Camo Rocktape is crap
customer_reviews.text: This tape sucks! It won't stick onto the second layer. Even on top of clean, dried skin, it started unraveling within an hour of taping it onto the skin. It's slightly thicker than the KT tape I had previously used so I thought it might be better but it's completely not worth it. It costs a lot more than the KT brand and seems to have great reviews so maybe it's just the Camo one but it sure doesn't stay on for 5 days, it started peeling off after an hour, even though I rounded off the edges. It's crap and a waste of money. Going back to KT brand.
customer_reviews.author: YC

customer_reviews.title: Go for the uncut rolls.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why but the precut rolls are less sticky than the uncut ones. And I don't mean they don't stick to my skin bc I didn't prep correctly etc, I mean they don't stick to themselves when they overlap. Pretty disappointed, I thought precut would save me some time. They are also stretchier and less rigid than the uncut ones.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Rock Tape not only for Athletes
customer_reviews.text: I used this tape to hold my patella in place when I am doing any activity I have problems with my knee swelling and this tape works well and stays on and its comfortable
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it, careful if you sweat lol
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure about it being water resistant, if I start to sweat a lot and move the area I have the tape it will come loose. I’ve used this a lot and it does make whatever body part feel 10 years younger! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Stays Better and Does Not Peel on Edges
customer_reviews.text: The RockTape stays on better and does not peel on edges compared to the other kinesiology tape I have used. However, I do follow the taping instructions from the other tape manufacturers as I find that works better for me. The pre-cut lengths are easier to use, though more wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Better products out there...
customer_reviews.text: While it works, it doesn't work as nearly as well as StrengthTape or Physics Gear and they both are about half the price. I only decided to give these guys a try because they're supposedly "the best" in the biz. I would definitely suggest looking elsewhere unless you like buying inferior products for more money. Their "Rock Sauce," however, is unquestionably the best muscle rub I have used. AND other tapes will stick to it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Better than the other KT tapes I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I bought Rock Tape because I heard it lasts longer then the other KT tapes. It absolutely does. I used to tape daily, and the other tapes would always come off in the shower. Rock tape will last 3-6 days, even with 1-2 showers per day. I'll be trying the Rock Tape H2O next.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Patrick

customer_reviews.title: How I was playing soccer without this!?!?
customer_reviews.text: I'm 48 years old and still playing soccer (futbol), with my friends every Sunday. I started to use Rock Tape on my knees and after a couple of games, I can swear by them! Always have knee problems and even a meniscus injury and surgery after. Highly recommendable!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leandro Ekman

customer_reviews.title: Rub the tape to warm it so it sticks well and it’ll last longer.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for plantar fasciitis. My friend who is a physical therapist taught me how to apply this tape. It lasts probably a week once applied. It helps a lot and it’s the same tape he uses for his clients.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: last a week or longer then KT Pro
customer_reviews.text: Rock tape is the best I have used so far. It definitely last longer then KT pro and KT Extreme. I was told to buy Rock Tape first however, I wanted to go the cheep route. The cheep route in this case costs more in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Check out infowars

customer_reviews.title: Stays On Well, Not Hypoallegenic
customer_reviews.text: Rock tape stays on very well. Tape does not appear to be latex-free/hypoallergenic as advertised as left a bad rash on my leg after only two days of being applied. Also, ordered pre-cut strips but received continuous roll and had to cut. Provided no pain relief. Nice try, but back to KT tape for me. Also, I really like the K-Active tape as truly hypo-allergenic (at least for me), but it is not available.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L. Byars

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick well
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several types of tape, this is by far the less sticky. Many last for 3-4 days. This started coming off after a bike ride or a round of golf. Because it is pre-cut, there is a lot of waste if you need to cut it down. I would recommend just a roll.
customer_reviews.author: Modtwinz

customer_reviews.title: Not precut like said
customer_reviews.text: The description says precut and it is not. Sadly I didn’t check before race day. Thankfully I brought scissors but it isn’t the same.
customer_reviews.author: runalattemomma

customer_reviews.title: Foot Ball Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: Helps For Foot Ball Pain which is under your toes. Those inflamed balls beneath your toes. Stetch the tape in a curve to conform the shape of the Ball of Your Foot where the pain is. Great Relief - Thanks to this company
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cook

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Would not stick for longer than one hour and it was irritating my skin. No help with muscle strain either.
customer_reviews.author: Sandan

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: Great tape. Recommended by trainer & massage therapist. Seems crazy but it does work & helps relieve pain. Stays on for several days Thru sweating & showers.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm Karen

customer_reviews.title: super water resistant and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: I could wear this tape through multiple showers so long as I let it dry before I did anything active I got about 4+ days of relief from joint pain each time I applied new tape
customer_reviews.author: Angela Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Less stick, more cost.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I got a bad roll, but mine had LESS stick thanand cost much more. This may work if you're doing multiple wraps so it can stick to itself, but if you want to use it in a single-layer strip I don't recommend it. I was hoping this product would stick better than the Physix tape and now I'm not sure what I'll do with it.
customer_reviews.author: RandomNinja

customer_reviews.title: Great tape
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old messed up his hip this fall and was in therapy for several months. The PT recommended this tape. It worked great to relieve the pain and didn't leave the residue like the rest. The fact it was camo didn't hurt his feelings either.
customer_reviews.author: Doug B.

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy the Camo Tape will not stick.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2different colors of tape. One was black and the other was camo. I have ordered the black previously and it is a good product. The cam tape is not good. It will not stick to other tape or itself. It falls off 10 minutes into a workout. Unfortunately I bought 2 rolls of the stuff. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: vince

customer_reviews.title: Better Adhesion than Better known Competitor
customer_reviews.text: I've tried Rock Tape head to head against KT. Rock tape sticks better, is slightly stiffer when applied I'm a convert
customer_reviews.author: BigDog

customer_reviews.title: I like the tape
customer_reviews.text: I like the tape, it does a great job supporting by ankle. The only consistent problem I have with it is it comes off at the corners very easily; often times before I am finished wrapping it. Occasionally I wear a sock over it to keep it in place, yet the tape still unravels and comes off my leg. On the plus side, the roll contains a lot of product and I can keep wrapping it when it comes off! The camo print is fun, too!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Grenier

customer_reviews.title: No allergic reaction, yay!
customer_reviews.text: I've got a huge sensitivity to latex, and other tape additives like zinc. Plus a wonkey bunion-related foot problem. Tried every tape out there and always had problems - athletic tape too stiff, 'kiniesiology' tapes itched from the adhesives. Thought I was doomed to a real mess without the tape, then tried RockTape. Flexible and really sticky, stays on for days. And no adhesive reaction.
customer_reviews.author: martha

customer_reviews.title: It really works
customer_reviews.text: I went to you tube and watched a few videos on how to apply this product at first I thought it was a gimmick and not going to help me with shinsplints or my IT band issues. but after watching the short videos and a little trial and error I was taping like a pro and my leg problems got better with a combo of taping and focus stretching and weight training in those area. give it a try great for runners knee. give them your money now if you want to lessen or completely rid yourself of body pains due to over, under training etc..
customer_reviews.author: Billy E. Mills Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe what a difference a piece of tape makes. Simple to use and relieved my pain.
customer_reviews.author: MsMurray

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!! Works well!
customer_reviews.text: It Works great and Love the color too! It's better to watch some videos from you tube for making sure!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay0128

customer_reviews.title: Love this tape
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't used it in a while but I bought again while preparing for my marathon. Got my knees through with no pain. It doesn't seem to stick as well as it used to though.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says
customer_reviews.text: Found the adhesion on this product better than other similar products.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works so good on my foot. I use this for my planter fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: JANET FERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this tape. I use it to protect my skin from heat rash when running in the warmer months, or to help secure pads to protect/prevent blisters. It's easy to apply and remove, and generally stays put unless stretched a bit too far...then I find the ends are prone to curling up. I've had the tape applied for plantar fasciitis for (I suppose) additional ligament support, but I personally never noticed any distinct benefit from that.
customer_reviews.author: alphalioness72

customer_reviews.title: Great tape for support!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for supporting my daughter's IT band and knee. She wears it under dance clothes and her martial arts uniform.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tooney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick as good as it should.
customer_reviews.text: While I love the rainbow design, the adhesion is not as good as with my other tapes. Not sure why. It also didn’t seem to work as well as the other tapes from this company. No matter I just use adhesive with it and it works good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No lines on back
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Rock tape for almost a year now. I continue to buy it because it's one of the best produces of its kind besides mummy tape. I only gave 4 stars because it feels like a gamble every time I buy one because I'm not sure if it will have the measured lines on the back or not. This one didn't have the lines.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: I like this tape but it doesn't always stay put
customer_reviews.text: I like this tape but it doesn't always stay put. The edges sometimes roll over and stick to the pants. It's got a nice stretch and when it does stay put it does relieve pain in my knee. I love that they are pre-cut into strips.
customer_reviews.author: B Krey

customer_reviews.title: Def works
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I work outside in the crazy heat but am also expected to be tattoo free. Being I have them in random places on my legs and arms pants and long sleeves were my only option until now. Stayed on through sweat and grime and almost forgot they were there.
customer_reviews.author: Carriemarie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great. Really helped support my knee during recovery from ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Really helped support my knee during recovery from an injury. Don't settle for an imitation brand. This is the best. I wasted my money on another one that didn't last as long and was not nearly as strong.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Ive used this on my shoulder and i feel like it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great pattern!  Great staying power!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I love the camo pattern! Secondly, Rocktape sticks and stays on better than any other kinesiology tape that I have tried (and I've tried most). I am a physical therapist and used it on my own wrist tendon pathology. It is also thicker and gives more of a "pull" than the other brands. The one downside is that the extra stickiness can lead to a little more skin irritation/breakdown than other tapes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Hutto

customer_reviews.title: Best kinesiology tape out there.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that it sticks better to my sweaty skin than other kinesiology tape. Not always, but better than the other tape out there.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Mom

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t stick to the skin
customer_reviews.text: I got the multicolor tape to use it on my ankle. The tape doesn’t stay at all. I follow the steps to use and I already ran out becuae it comes off. I tried a single, double and triple layer.. and it doesn’t stick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: Love rock tape. Similar to KT tape but stays on a little longer.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: I love Rocktape
customer_reviews.text: Used this to reduce plantar fasciitis and knee pain for a Spartan Super and Rocktape came through!! I noticed that these were a bit more stuff than the regular black which was good because I felt a bit more supported on my plantar fascia. I've been using Rocktape for the past 2 years and I love it! You cut it to your needs and get the different designs you want. When I found the rainbow I had to buy it without a second thought!
customer_reviews.author: DRamos

customer_reviews.title: It’s AWESOME TAPE
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time on my knees works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pre cut strips did not stick
customer_reviews.text: I have used rock tape for several years. I can tape my knee and leave it on for several days and it works wonderfully. I saw pre-cut strips and thought it was a great idea. The problem is it doesn't stick! I don't understand this but the pre-cut strips are a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Michael Koenig

customer_reviews.title: best kinesiology tape i have used so far
customer_reviews.text: this stuff is much better than kt tape, as the adhesive actually works. stays on under most conditions provided that you apply it 10-15 minutes ahead of exercise so that the adhesive has time to set. if you start sweating under the tape before the adhesive sets it will slowly peel off, but if done properly, you can go swimming no worries
customer_reviews.author: the500

customer_reviews.title: The sticky truth
customer_reviews.text: The tape helped but was almost a constant battle to keep it adhered to my skin. Often times it would start falling off like old sun burned skin.
customer_reviews.author: neil

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: I love Rock Tape! I tape part of my foot daily and Rock Tape works great. I love the range of colors and patterns available, and the tape itself is high quality, stretchy, durable, and effective. I have tried cheaper brands of kinesiology tape and I always go back to Rock Tape. It's not cheap, but it's the best.
customer_reviews.author: Jo S. Ginsberg

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff!  Really Helps!
customer_reviews.text: Rock Tape really helps at times to keep my knee from being overly inflamed and stiff due to severe arthritis. There are also other brands on the market, but this product, Rock Tape is by far better and its what physical therapy places use. You can also get the waterproof version which stays on longer.
customer_reviews.author: Christina T

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this for knee support on long runs, doing legs at the gym, and recovery after. I also wear it for support while working as a night shift nurse. Love RockTape!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: The rainbow colored tape is firmer with less elasticity than ...
customer_reviews.text: The rainbow colored tape is firmer with less elasticity than the purple colored tape for some reason, but both have worked and helped my daughter work through her shoulder problem.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: It's super cute, I cut it in half and make ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this to reinforce my Dexcom CGM sensor. It's super cute, I cut it in half and make a box. It has to be replaced every 2-3 days as it pulls away from the skin quickly. Better for a one time use or during a sporting event. CGM wearers are better off using a GrifGrip or RockADex
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Good but without putting pain relief on it.
customer_reviews.text: Went on real well used with my Chill relief. It dried and then it stuck to my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Chelzy

customer_reviews.title: but the camo is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy KT tape for injuries and rehab, but the last couple of rolls I purchased did not stay on very well. I know how to use these products and have a fair amount of experience, so I do not believe it was due to application. Rocktape stays on even during my hardest workouts. I have a few colors, but the camo is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Rock Tape rocks !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love rock tape. I had a bad foot and needed a knee scooter. I loved the scooter for mobility, but it hurt my knee & my shin. I taped my knee for a few months, & the swelling was gone. I, recently, had a bone spur on same foot. Nothing helped with the pain (shot or lazer). Dr taped it and no pain. I had surgery yesterday, because I also needed a fusion. I ordered 2 rolls j ust to have on hand. Love, love rock tape !!! This time, I'm using a seated scooter. Terrific !!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Rock Tape Lasts!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several of the kinesio tapes (KT, Kenesio Tex Tape and Rock Tape)and found you get what you pay for. All perform the same function but the Rock Tape will stay in place noticaeably longer than the rest. The KT tape came off either during the actual exercise or right after a shower, the Kenesio Tex Tape was good for 2-3 days and the Rock Tape was good for a mimimum of 3-4 days. I have used it for support of ankle sprain and treatment of achilles tendonitis with good results. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT STICK
customer_reviews.text: The tape was of no help as it did not stick for more than a few hours and not overnight so it did not help reduceleg and ankle swelling.
customer_reviews.author: DALE E. BROOKS

customer_reviews.title: Marathon training ok
customer_reviews.text: Using this for my one knee that is a bit moody, works great. I've also used it for my back and it came in handy. I'm training for a half marathon, so i think it's a good item to have handy. It just comes off by itself in about 5 days, so be aware if you're planning on going tanning. You can force it off, but it will take some of your hair with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky enough apparently
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product in June and it worked great for peroneal and posterior tibialis tendonitis when running. As it was June, I was quite sweaty during long distance runs, but the tape held. It's now August and it wont stay adhered for more than fifteen minutes (right around when I start sweating). Quite disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive sticky yet comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive is sticky yet comfortable. Will keep this in stock to use as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Reduced the pain in my shoulder immediately and ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Reduced the pain in my shoulder immediately and stayed on for over a week (with daily showers). I was impressed with how effective this product was. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: E. Wienecke

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is incredible.
customer_reviews.text: I first used Rocktape when I was at the chiropractor for tendonitis in my rotator cuff. The first time I used it I felt no pain for 7 days!!! That was over 2 years ago. My recent purchase was not in vain, as I've been wearing my first application of Rocktape for 4 days and my shoulder has felt loads better. I love how it stays on for a 5-7 days too. If you havent tried it, you should. Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Nikowise

customer_reviews.title: works fine but really just adds that little extra
customer_reviews.text: stays on me for about 5 days; works fine but really just adds that little extra
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It really helps
customer_reviews.text: Super helpful product. I'm allergic to the adhesive and I still use it because of how much it helps. I've used it on my upper and lower back, knees, and ankles.
customer_reviews.author: MmB

customer_reviews.title: Painful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the tape it worked great but the downside that made me give it only 2 stars was that it’s extremely painful to remove, even in the shower after letting it soak it pull skin and created scabs on my knees as well as bruises. So if you don’t have sensitive skin it’s great. Just be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great adhering-stays on for days
customer_reviews.text: Great product for aches and pains. Something every runner with some pains can use!
customer_reviews.author: Burgerqueen

customer_reviews.title: I like the tape...hate the colors!
customer_reviews.text: The functionality of this product is great. It works well and exactly as stated. My problem is that the color pattern I ordered looks nothing like what I received. I ordered the digital camouflage and was expecting what is shown in the image, what I got was the correct box, but the tape itself has sky blue where I was expecting olive green. Not sure what's up with that! I need the tape so I have to use it, but there are other options out there so probably will try another brand...don't like not getting what I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Ted Ancelet

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tape! Much better product then KT Tape. My physical therapist uses it and I continue to use even after physical therapy ended.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie chitwood

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really rocks
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fantastic. Normally I am allergic to tape but I have been wearing this for over a month on my knee, and it's been a life changer and haven't had the usual allergic reactions. I did work with my pt to get advice on how to put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Ray

customer_reviews.title: support
customer_reviews.text: don't know why this stuff works, but I love it
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN J CARSON

customer_reviews.title: Best tape ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Rock tape, ROCKS!!!!! Used it for knee support during a marathon, stayed on thru the entire 26 miles plus 5 days after that. As far as the company, they sent me the wrong print. But the send me the correct print the I ordered free shipping even before I sent the one I got.
customer_reviews.author: Jenen

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I brought the rainbow tape to tape my knee while cheerleading at a pride parade. Did not stay on at all, product description said sweatproof and waterproof and adhesive barely lasted 10 minutes on a hot day outside. Very disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Alex
